Comments_List: This semester I mainly worked on Prokofiev Sonata No. 6 and Mozart Sonata k. 470. It was rewarding that I finally learned these two pieces thoroughly.
It's always one of my favorite classes.
Take it if you want to keep up with your instrument learning.
